title: Himi 132
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Pea tuku atu
‘Ene pule lelei
Ki māmani kotoa pē
Ke monū’ia ai.
2.
Ko hono ikuna
‘O hono kolosi;
‘Oku ne folahi atu,
Ke tau vakai ki ai;
3.
Vakai ki he fuka,
Pani ta’ata’a;
Ko hono faka’ilonga,
Ko ia ko e Hau;
4.
Pea ‘i he ‘ao,
‘O e Kapiteni;
Ke tau tau, ‘a e tau lelei
‘O e tui, mo au.
5.
Ke tau loto taha,
‘O fai fakataha;
Pea tau hiki ki he tau,
‘O hotau ‘Otua.
6.
Ko e mahafu tau,
‘Oku tau tali’aki,
Ko e loto ta’engaue,
Na’e ‘ia Sīsū. *
